Package imagingbook.pub.regions.segment

Class DepthFirstSegmentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.segment.BinaryRegionSegmentation
      • imagingbook.pub.regions.segment.DepthFirstSegmentation
  • public class DepthFirstSegmentation
extends BinaryRegionSegmentation
    Binary region labeler based on a depth-first flood filling algorithm (using a queue).
    Version:
    2020/04/01
